resources.string: Please enter where you spent it
Rate the app on android market!

This is a fast app designed specifically for people having no time to wait while an app loads before they can use it. 

To add or delete a group, press the menu button on the first screen and select the appropriate command. To delete a record or change its group, long press it. When a group deletes, all its records transfer to None group. 

Kindly rate us on the Android App Market if you like the app. Future updates depend on the comments and ratings of the current version. 

Once again, I thank you for downloading this app. Email us your suggestions or comments to pilanites@gmail.com
